== Main Inclusion Report for kgrubeditor ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/k/kgrubeditor]]</nowiki>; available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Dependency of Kubuntu
0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=PRODUCT_NAME|CVE entries]]</nowiki>: None
** <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=PRODUCT_NAME|Secunia history]]</nowiki>: None
** kgrubeditor needs to run as root
** No network activity
** Process apt data
** No source code review performed
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Always works (for grub using systems)
** No debconf questions
** Not in Debian
** No upstream bug tracker <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/projects/kgrubeditor]]</nowiki>
** Hardware: Does not deal with hardware
** No test suite
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant
** Packaging system cdbs, quilt patch system
0. ''Dependencies:''
** KDE, imagemagick
** All in main 
0. ''Background information:''
** The general purpose and context of the package is from the package's debian/control file.
